name: 黃正民
objective: Z-轉換在數位控制之應用，取樣與訊號重整，狀態方程式，類比系統與數位系統之關係，穩定度分析，根值軌跡圖，時域下數位控制系統之控制器設計，頻域下數位控制系統之控制器設計，現代控制理論在數位系統之應用。
schedule:
Week 1. Introduction
Week 2. Continuous-Time Systems and Discrete-Time Systems
Week 3. Continuous-Time Systems and Discrete-Time Systems
Week 4. z-Transform
Week 5. z-Transform
Week 6. z-Domain Analysis
Week 7. z-Domain Analysis
Week 8. z-Domain Analysis
Week 9. Midterm Exam
Week 10. State Space Analysis
Week 11. State Space Analysis
Week 12. Digital Controllers Design using State-Space Methods
Week 13. Digital Controllers Design using State-Space Methods
Week 14. Digital Controllers Design using State-Space Methods
Week 15. Digital Observer Design
Week 16. Digital Observer Design
Week 17. Digital Observer Design
Week 18. Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Homework (with Matlab programming) 20%
Midterm Exam (closed book)         35%
Final Exam (closed book)           45%
materials:
Textbook
Katsuhiko Ogata, Discrete-Time Control Systems, 2nd ed., Pearson Education Taiwan, 2006.
Reference
C.T. Chen, Linear System Theory and Design, 3rd Ed, Oxford University Press, 1999.
Gene F. Franklin, J. David Powell, Michael L. Workman, Digital Control of Dynamic Systems, 2nd ed., Addison-Wesley Pub. Co., 1990.
